function EP01_13()
    -- .結-1「姫皇・登場」
    SaveData.Title = "姫皇・登場"

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-960,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,960,0,30000,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Wooden seats lined up, the grand auditorium filled with a solemn atmosphere. At the very back stood a stage, and the seating extended not only on the first floor but also reached the second floor, making it so luxurious it hardly felt like just a school facility. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san and I followed the teacher's guidance and took seats right in front of the stage, in the very front row on the first floor. ]])

    MSG([[ The teacher seemed very busy due to the earlier pervert incident, so the seating order was apparently assigned randomly based on entry order. ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Finally, the long-awaited Yuriai Private Academy entrance ceremony! My heart is pounding so much!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0068.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "What an amazing building. The seats go all the way up to the second floor; it’s just like a live concert venue." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Since many events are held jointly with the Middle School division, it looks like it has a capacity for over a thousand people!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "But! Middle School students have to sit in the outermost seats, so this is the first time for us to see the stage this close! It’s so exciting!" ]])

    MSG([[ From the perspective of those coming up from Middle School, these seats assigned to the new students are a coveted prize. ]])

    MSG([[ The other students around us, still seated, were sharing in the excitement, glancing nervously around, unable to hold back their tension and excitement. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone looked so happy and excited that just watching made me happy as well. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hehe. After all, Yuriai Private Academy really is a place all the girls admire." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuah? Erika-san, you’re a girl too, but you say strange things, don’t you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-Yes yes yes! I-I mean, including myself! Of course, I mean absolutely everything in every possible way!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Y-Yeah, I get it, okay?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu tilted her head but seemed satisfied. D-Don’t let your guard down, this happens so easily... pathetic. ]])

    MSG([[ The entrance ceremony was scheduled to last just under two hours. I would soon be freed from this living hell. ]])

    MSG([[ Until then, I needed to stay sharp so that my gender wouldn't be exposed... ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "When she shows up, the atmosphere just changes, doesn’t it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? Someone special is coming?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuah? Erika-san didn’t know? There are even students who enroll just to see ‘that person’... Truly a mysterious figure." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Once the ceremony starts, you’ll understand immediately." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The ‘that person’ Hiyu mentioned was revealed as soon as the entrance ceremony began. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,-500)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)


PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Eveeeerybody~~~~~!!! Are you all seated properly~~~~??? Ready~~~~???" ]])

    -- //エルメス

    MSG([[ From the speakers came a cute voice reminiscent of a cat’s meow. At the same moment, an immense cheer erupted from every corner of the building. ]])

    -- //SE：歓声（大）
    PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav",0,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,30,30,1000,false)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!?!??!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Whoa!" ]])

PLAY_SE("SEc007.wav")
EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Overwhelmed by the cheers, I slid off my chair. Hiyu next to me was also simultaneously crying and having a nosebleed out of joy. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "It’s r-real... the real Hermes-chan’s voice!!! Just hearing it makes my ears so happy I feel like I’m melting...!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "H-Hermes-chan...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ The name sounded familiar somehow. And the voice also seemed familiar. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Thanks for the cheerful cheers~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Thanks to everyone’s voices, I’m full of energy and feeling miracuru~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I’m coming your way now, so wait for me~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    -- //エルメス

    -- //SE：何かが軋む音
    PLAY_SE("SEb018.wav")
--    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ Noticing the voice came from behind, I turned around. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? W-What’s that!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but point. A girl was standing on the railing of the second floor seats and waving at us. ]])

    -- CI：エルメスBU笑顔の口元切り抜き 013
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,75)
    SET_CUTIN_01_L(50, 500,true)

    -- //SE：ザワめき
    --PLAY_SE("SEf004.wav")

    MSG([[ A murmur spread through the auditorium. The tense atmosphere thickened. For some reason, the teachers just watched silently. Then the girl jumped off the railing. ]])

    --STOP_SE("SEf004.wav",0)
    RESET_CUTIN_01(50, 500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "D-Danger!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Just as I reflexively tried to jump to where she would land, the girl’s body shifted midair. ]])

    -- //SE：何かが擦れる音
PLAY_SE("SEc008.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Drawing a crescent-shaped arc like a trapeze, she passed just barely over the heads of us spectators. ]])

    MSG([[ From the belt around her waist, a thin wire extended to the ceiling, enabling her swinging motion. ]])

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ After completing the crescent swing and losing all momentum, she detached the belt. ]])

    MSG([[ Naturally, having lost support midair, she began to fall from what must have been a several-meter height—but a beaming smile lit up her face. ]])

    -- //CG：姫神エルメス登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV006aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Greetings everyone<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I’m Hermes Himegami, student representative of this academy and leader of the ‘Four Princesses’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’ll be hosting today’s entrance ceremony, so let’s get this party started the best way ever~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Let’s get super pumped~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ Then, landing gracefully on the stage, she winked at us in the audience. ]])

    -- //SE：歓声（MAX)
    PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    MSG([[ The venue shook. It was so loud I tensed up, thinking it was an earthquake—the loudest cheer of the day. ]])

    MSG([[ Even Daria-san, Uran-san, or even Marika-neechan would have a hard time receiving that much support. Truly befitting the leader of the ‘Princesses.’ ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "T-The person who’s the leader of the ‘Four Princesses’…!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I was surprised for two reasons. First, that the figure who appeared on stage was the national idol, Hermes Himegami. ]])

    MSG([[ Starting with last year’s top domestic CD sales, then a live concert at Budokan, lead roles in dramas and movies, and appearances on various TV programs—it seemed there wasn’t a day when she wasn’t talked about. ]])

    MSG([[ Even I, who barely watched TV, vaguely remembered her appearance. ]])

    MSG([[ Such an idol appearing casually at the academy and hosting the entrance ceremony—Yuriai Private Academy’s abnormality surprised me anew. ]])

    MSG([[ The other reason was that she was the girl I had met earlier on the rooftop. But the surprise didn’t end there— ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yoshichan-sensei originally asked me to say something serious at first... but I couldn’t come up with anything! Sorry, sensei!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But what I want to tell everyone is just one thing, so it’s okay! It’s that ‘Cute is justice’ here at Yuriai Private Academy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "‘Cute’ isn’t just about looks<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> It’s about looks, skills, mindset—everyone believes in their completely different kinds of ‘cute’!" ]])

    MSG([[ Like trying to embrace all the students in the auditorium, Hermes spread her arms wide in a grand gesture. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "There are still some who lack confidence in their own ‘cute,’ right? But don’t worry... I and the other ‘Princesses’ will support the ‘cute’ that you believe in!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So… everyone, make your ‘cute’ explode to the fullest! As student representative, I’ll captivate everyone with the absolute best ‘cute’ there is<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ Her childish and overwhelmingly one-sided words somehow possessed charm and persuasiveness, making it impossible to look away from Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Her impression earlier on the rooftop of being cold and intimidating was completely different; confusion spread inside me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (That’s the girl I met on the rooftop… right? Same appearance, but completely different atmosphere, yet) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ The deja vu I felt towards Hermes earlier was probably because I had seen her on TV. ]])

    MSG([[ But the image of the Hermes I met earlier and the one speaking now on stage just wouldn’t mesh in my mind. It felt like I was facing an entirely different person. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009",1000,false)

    -- //BG：屋上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Girl】
 "Why...? Why is it like this...?" ]])

    MSG([[ I felt like I was forgetting something very important— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female student】
 "Kyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!?" ]])
    -- //龍城院友梨

STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ A sudden scream snapped me back to reality. ]])

    MSG([[ That scream was evidently different from the yellow cheer directed at Hermes—it was filled with disgust. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The source of the scream was a girl sitting very close to us. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BU：モブ男性
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,300)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",0)

    MSG([[ The girl pointed shakily toward a male security guard standing near the stage side. He was pulling his hat low to hide his face. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB08aa")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female student】
 "That person! He’s the pervert I saw this morning! He was in a uniform earlier, then suddenly grabbed me...!" ]])
    -- //龍城院友梨

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female student】
 "I couldn’t see his face well, but those scary eyes! There’s no mistake!" ]])

    -- //龍城院友梨

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Eh!? The ‘pervert’ wasn’t me!?) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I was confused, unable to grasp the situation. ]])

    MSG([[ But thinking carefully, there hadn’t been any gap between my meeting Hermes and the announcement, and somehow I was said to have hugged a girl. ]])

    MSG([[ In other words, the announced pervert wasn’t me...? ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BU：モブ男性
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Heh heh… ihihihihihihih…" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ As if confirming my theory, the man suddenly laughed and climbed onto the stage where Hermes stood. ]])

    MSG([[ In his hand was a knife, seemingly pulled from his pocket! The man clearly intended to approach Hermes with malicious intent! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Hermes-chan... be with meee... Hermes-chan, Hermes-chan..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female student】
 "Kyaaaaa!? H-Hermes-sama!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female student】
 "Princess, run awayyy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hermes, stay still! I’m coming to you right now!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
PLAY_SE("SEc043.wav")
WAIT(900)

    MSG([[ Seeing other guards and students try to approach the stage, the man swung the knife threateningly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Don’t come near our stage with Hermes! Try taking one step closer and I’ll stab, s-stab Hermes-chan right in the chest!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (This is bad... his eyes aren’t focused) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ He might be under the influence of drugs or suffering from a mental illness, having lost his reason. Hermes was in danger if this continued. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //CI：寝たきりのマリカ（セピア） 014
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI014a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ The image of Marika-neechan still sleeping in the hospital flashed through my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ There was no way an amateur like me could do anything. But still, I couldn’t just stand by while someone might get hurt. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (It’s dangerous if he attacks Hermes now. I have to somehow find a chance to get close before he starts rampaging...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）、モブ男性
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")

    MSG([[ However, my plan was immediately shattered. Hermes showed no sign of caution and walked close to the man. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (H-Hermes-san!? What are you thinking!?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "You knew I was coming to the academy today, didn’t you?<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "O-Of course... yesterday’s live was in Nagoya, and your regular show was off last week, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "The serious, hardworking Hermes-chan taking a break from the show meant it was just about your studies... that’s all..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Amazing, amazing! I’m so very pleased you know so much about me<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Thank you!" ]])

    MSG([[ Even though there was a man with a weapon right in front of her, Hermes showed no signs of panic, speaking in her usual tone. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of that, the agitated man seemed to regain some composure. ]])

    MSG([[ An idol smilingly and kindly talking to a dangerous pervert with a weapon—just watching it felt like my life was being shortened. ]])

    MSG([[ Whether it was acting or genuine, Hermes was definitely someone with superhuman courage. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hey, what’s wrong? You look pale, are you okay?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Aaaaaaaah! Shut uuuup!!! Hermes-chan, please! Understand meee!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yeah, you’re asking me. Ahem! So what is it you want me to understand?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "They said they were firing me! I worked without complaint! And yet—!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Only Hermes-chan... only Hermes-chan smiles at me! That’s why!" ]])

    MSG([[ The man cried out painfully with tears. Hermes showed no fear and took another step closer. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "What can I do? Tell me." ]])

--    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("female-teacher_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female teacher】
 "H-Himegami-san, it’s dangerous! Get away right—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("delirium_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Confused man】
 "Don’t come closer!!! I told you it’s our stage with Hermes-chan!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("female-teacher_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female teacher】
 "Eek!?" ]])

    MSG([[ As a teacher rushed to approach the stage, the man, in a rage, suddenly pointed the knife at Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though he was out of his mind, he was aware of his surroundings. Approaching recklessly was dangerous. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Rinrin-sensei, it’s okay, it’s okay<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I’m fine<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 400, -45, 80, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’ll make everyone happy right away, so trust me and watch over this<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
